guide.title: Personal assistant guides
guide.description: At ATM JET, we know how many tasks a personal assistant has to deal with. We strive to help our clients from the very beginning of thetask at hand.
guide.description2: We have compiled our flight preparation checklist for you, which will help you to organise your flight more easily, taking into account all the wishes of your manager.

best-price.title: Best price assurance
best-price.description: We appreciate your time. We are committed to giving you the best price on the market. Contact us for the best offer.
